name: Tangiro
abilities: Demon Slayer Mark, Transparent World, Immense Strength, Immense Stamina
fightstyle: Tanjiro was always shown to be a sword-fighting prodigy, starting out with skill rivaling Sabito, one of Sakonji Urokodaki's strongest students and surpassing him in half a year's time and avenging his death by defeating the Hand Demon.
techniques: First Form: Water Surface Slash, Second Form: Water Wheel, Second Form: Improved, Lateral Water Wheel, Third Form: Flowing Dance, Fourth Form: Striking Tide

name: Zenitsu
abilities: Tactical Intellect, Unconscious Combat, Indomitable Will, Immense Speed & Reflexes
fightstyle: Zenitsu is an incredibly talented swordsman, displaying highly refined proficiency in extremely fast Iaijutsu-like swordsmanship and the Thunderclap and Flash technique, to the point he can create offshoots of the technique and utilize it even while he is asleep.
techniques: First Form: Thunderclap and Flash, Godspeed, Eightfold, Sixfold

name: Inosuke
abilities: Animal Imitation, Indomitable Will, Poison Resistance, Enhanced Flexibility
fightstyle: Inosuke has displayed exemplary skill in dual wielding his Nichirin katanas, allowing him to take on and defeat demons in various occasions, even enabling him to match members of the Twelve Kizuki.
techniques: First Fang: Pierce,Second Fang: Slice, Third Fang: Devour, Fourth Fang: Slice 'n' Dice

name: Kyojuro
abilities: Immense Stamina & Endurance, Immense Speed & Reflexes, Extrasensory Perception
fightstyle: As a Hashira of the Demon Slayer Corps, Kyojuro was one of the most powerful and skilled swordsmen in the entire organization.
techniques: First Form: Unknowing Fire, Second Form: Rising Scorching Sun, Third Form: Blazing Universe, Fourth Form: Blooming Flame Undulation

name: Tengen
abilities: Shinobi Training, Enhanced Stealth, Poison Resistance, Muscle Control, Immense Strength
fightstyle: Unlike most Demon Slayers, Tengen chooses to utilize a dual-wielding swordsmanship style with his Nichirin Cleavers, making use of a nunchucks-esque sword wielding style.
techniques: First Form: Roar, Fourth Form, Fifth Form
